short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate Spellar, an AI Speaking Copilot, to provide recording suggestions in your online meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is an extension for Spellar AI. It monitors your online meetings and reminds you to start the meeting with Spellar.

To access Spellar, visit the App Store: [Spellar AI - Speaking Copilot](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/spellar-ai-speaking-copilot/id6473629578?mt=12)
